name: Volatility Shock
description: Sudden spike in volatility (flash crash scenario). Tests GARCH reactivity to extreme shocks and regime detection.

input.comment: Generated by generateGARCH_Shock() - Stable→SHOCK (4.5% daily)→Gradual return

shockDetection.comment: Conditional volatility should spike dramatically during shock period (indices 100-120)

forecastBehavior.comment: Forecasts should adapt quickly to elevated volatility then gradually return to normal

notes: Flash crash scenario. GARCH α parameter controls reactivity to shocks. Higher α means faster adaptation to sudden volatility changes. Regime should classify as EXTREME during shock.
